category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Miscellaneous mark
definition: This version of the ?? Detective emoji has the ?? Medium Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Moderate Brown Skin Tone on supported pl http://emojipedia.org/sleuth-or-spy-type-4/
name: detective: medium skin tone

bn:00072138n: A detective who follows a trail
The Mickey Mouse universe is a fictional universe in which the Disney cartoon character Mickey Mouse lives.

bn:00026633n: Police officer who looks for evidence.
A police officer who investigates crimes

Skill level in the Purble Place game. Once a Purble Place game is completed, a player gets a skill level rank assigned automatically by the game (based on number of guesses and hints during the game).
A person who investigates crimes, can be a rank and job in a police department, state or federal employee, or a civilian called a private detective
Investigator, either a member of a police agency or a private person
A police officer who looks for evidence as part of solving a crime; an investigator.
A detective is an investigator, usually a member of a law enforcement agency.
Someone who investigates by carefully analyzing each clue.

note: This emoji was found in merged_emojis_before_fluentui but not in FluentUI
apple_vendor_description: The detective emoji on Apple devices is a masterclass in detail, featuring a person with a medium skin tone clad in a classic trench coat and fedora, complete with a magnifying glass. Apple‚Äôs design imbues it with a sense of mystery and intrigue, utilizing realistic lighting to cast subtle shadows and highlight the textures of the clothing and accessories. This emoji, with its sharp yet softly rounded elements, is perfect for conveying investigation, curiosity, or a search for clues in any digital exchange.
